main event: A civilian reported seeing a light-colored, self-illuminating circular object in Bellefontaine, Ohio on December 6, 1968.
interesting points: The witness reported the object moved from east to south while he was driving., The object was described as a solid circle with fuzzy edges and about the size of a quarter., The witness contradicted himself multiple times during the interview., Another observer was present but their identity was unknown., The report was deemed unreliable by the investigating officer.
witness description: male, 19 years old, assembly line worker, high school graduate
